title: Fate/Prototype: Fragments of Blue and Silver - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Antihero Protagonist   Battle Competition   Evil Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Folklore   Heroes   Knights   Legends   Master-Servant Relationship   Servants   Summoned Hero   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic
author: Sakurai Hikaru   Type-Moon
description:
It is a prequel light novel series to Fate/Prototype (Original draft of Fate/stay Night).

In this alternate universe, Saber, the legendary King of Knights is a man that summoned as a servant by Manaka Sajyou, the protagonist of this story. Follow their story to see what happened in the First Holy Grail War eight years ago before the Fate/Prototype start.>
